## activitiesExplorerActionGroupId variable

All built-in action group IDs available in Activities Explorer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
activitiesExplorerActionGroupId: {
    exporting: 'exporting';
    refreshing: 'refreshing';
    workflow: 'workflow';
}
```
